pathAssistantSteps.info:
Add the date when this payment group is sent to bank.

Note that bank date field will be automatically automatically set to day date for "credit card" or "transfer" like payment method.

Payment group is automatically closed after the maximum payment per group configured by your administrator. You can close the Payment Group manually anyway.

Note that bank group will be automatically close every day.

Before sending to the bank verify that the payment group amount is equal to the expected sum of payment.

Note that this action is critical for checks and cash payments
Set this status if accounting team adjusted all payment and payment groups.
